DOC.brief_summary: Using NIH-funded Way Health platform , investigator conduct smoke cessation randomize control trial ( RCT ) among CVS employee . The investigator able determine comparative absolute efficacy effectiveness 4 different incentive structure ground behavioral economic principle . Additionally , investigator measure rate reason acceptance incentive structure , examine participant characteristic modify efficacy acceptance different incentive structure .
DOC.brief_title: Way Quit - Comparative Efficacy , Acceptance Effectiveness Health Incentive Structures
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aim I : Compare efficacy effectiveness 4 financial incentive structure improve `` quit rate '' ( rate prolong smoke abstinence 6 month ) : ( ) individual financial reward , ( b ) individual deposit contract , ( c ) cooperative reward , ( ) competitive deposit contract H1 : Compared usual care , 4 incentive structure increase quit rate significantly . H2 : Compared individual financial reward equivalent size schedule , individual deposit contract , cooperative reward , competitive contract increase quit rate significantly . H3 : Group-oriented structure increase quit rate significantly individual-oriented structure . Specific Aim II : Compare smoker ' acceptance 4 financial incentive structure smoke cessation H4 : Uptake rate reward-based structure high structure involve deposit contract . H5 : Uptake rate group-oriented structure higher individual-oriented structure . Specific Aim III : Identify individual characteristic modify incentive structure ' efficacy acceptance H6 : Incentives promote relatively great quit rate among participant few substitute reinforcer . H7 : Incentives promote relatively great quit rate among participant low income . H8 : Higher-income person relatively likely accept incentive require deposit contract .
DOC.criteria: Active smoker 5 cigarette per day least 6 month ; At least 18 year old ; Current full parttime employee CVS family member friend current full parttime employee CVS . Use form tobacco cigarettes participate study ( may influence biochemical testing ) ; Are unable unwilling access internet ; Are unable provide inform consent . Due webbased nature study , people without reliable computer internet access also exclude .
